https://tmrev.io/movie/55141-Bangkok Haunted 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/alF38hmeoqqIsvsBqP2bJcpw9TE.jpg Three young women gathered in a coffee bar in Bangkok tell and discuss three original ghost stories with each other. The first tale: In Bangkok, the young Jieb receives an ancient drum not listed in the order from the truck of Transportation Company owned by Mr. Anake. She calls her former Professor Arkom, who identifies the markings for good luck that she describes and tells the story of the orphan Paga. In 1917, the renowned music teacher Jangwah-Chuem and his wife Peng raise the beautiful Paga with their deformed son Gnod. Bangkok Haunted
